name: Lonesome Village (itch)
description:
Lonesome Village
Prototype v 0.0.2

Lonesome Village is a fantasy adventure about puzzle solving and social simulation.

Play as Coyote, release kidnapped Villagers and interact with them at the village, discover the end of this demo.

Game Controls:
[W][A][S][D] : Movement
[space] : Action

Current version is a prototype, it represents a work in progress...

Ogre Pixel
www.ogrepixel.com
